definition: pillow/to pillow/to rest one's head on (Taiwan pr. [zhen4] for this sense)

sentences.english: This paper introduces control system of sleeper maintenance based on OMRON PLC.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了以歐姆龍PLC爲核心的軌枕養護控制系統。

sentences.english: Sleepers are not allowed to contact each other at double sleeper, short sleeper and sleeper heads.
sentences.chinese: 軌枕之間不允許在雙枕，短枕以及枕頭處進行接觸。

sentences.english: P-TEC provides sleepers for various systems and rail fastenings.
sentences.chinese: TEC可以提供各種軌枕及軌道緊固件。

sentences.english: Sleeper surfaces should be free of cracks and have a small amount of pores.
sentences.chinese: 軌枕表面必須沒有裂縫，且有小數量的小孔。

sentences.english: If you are an average sleeper, your sleep cycle is as follows.
sentences.chinese: 如果您是平均軌枕，您的睡眠週期如下。
